subject: New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: Meb Keflezighi will be back to defend his New York City Marathon title Nov. 7, trying to become the first American since Alberto Salazar to win back-to-back titles in New York.
snippet: Meb Keflezighi will be back to defend his New York City Marathon title Nov. 7, trying to become the first American since Alberto Salazar to win back-to-back titles in New York.
